Title: Hospitality
Description: The Organizing team of Crypto2k16 are working to make our participants to feel comfortable .The Campus of Adhiyamaan Provides home like environment to all its students.Come ! you too feel like staying at your home with free of cost.Yes!, You Read Correctly!,Department of Computer Science and Engineering provides free accomodation to all the participants of Crypto2k16.Contact us for more info.
